objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#F5F5F5'/><defs><radialGradient id='circleGradient' cx='540' cy='540' r='350' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFFFFF'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#F0F0F0'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='redGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#D50032'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#B8002B'/></linearGradient></defs><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='#F5F5F5'/><path d='M0 0 C400 100, 800 150, 1080 50 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='#EBEBEB' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M1080 0 C800 200, 400 150, 0 300 L0 1080 L1080 1080 Z' fill='#E0E0E0' opacity='0.4'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='320' fill='url(#circleGradient)' stroke='#D50032' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='5,5'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='white' stroke='#D50032' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='850' cy='400' r='130' fill='url(#redGradient)' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='3'/><g opacity='0.15'><circle cx='150' cy='250' r='15' fill='#D50032'/><circle cx='900' cy='200' r='20' fill='#D50032'/><circle cx='800' cy='850' r='25' fill='#D50032'/><circle cx='200' cy='750' r='18' fill='#D50032'/></g><g stroke='#D50032' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.2'><path d='M100 100 L200 180' /><path d='M980 100 L900 200' /><path d='M980 980 L880 900' /><path d='M100 980 L180 880' /></g><path d='M200 300 L880 300' stroke='#D50032' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.1' stroke-dasharray='10,15'/><path d='M200 780 L880 780' stroke='#D50032' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.1' stroke-dasharray='10,15'/></svg>

product_details.description: Always be ready to play with the Adizero 11 Receiver’s Gloves from adidas! Designed to provide exceptional comfort and grip to keep up with intense gameplay. This glove features box fingertip construction to deliver an unbeatable fit for your fingertips, without any pinching or tightness. It includes a custom injection molded rubber tab with no-snag hook and loop closure to make sure it is always secure. Enhance your game with the Adizero 11 Football Gloves for receivers! Our football receiver gloves are carefully made with engineered PrimeKnit Mesh to provide the structure, support, and performance you deserve. They are designed with GripTack - an exclusive palm treatment that ensures amazing grip and performance in all weather conditions, while AeroReady technology wicks away moisture and keeps your hands cool and dry. Plus, our receiver gloves include 4-way stretch multi-dimensional fabric that naturally mimics the movements and motion of your hand, delivering supreme accuracy that will keep you ready for the next play. All adidas football gloves are certified to meet SFIA specifications required for in-game use. Experience each play like never before with the Adizero 11 Gloves! 35% Polyester, 34% Nylon, 17% Silicone, 11% Spandex, 3% Chloroprene Rubber Imported READY TO PLAY: Always be ready for every game with the adidas Adizero 11 Receiver Gloves for Football! Designed with exclusive technology, high-quality materials, and exceptional comfort, these football gloves will keep you prepared for any play. UNBEATABLE GRIP: Our durable football gloves feature GripTack - an adidas exclusive palm treatment that provides unparalleled grip and performance in all weather conditions. You will be able to rely on these gloves to help expertly catch every ball! AEROREADY: Never fumble with sweaty palms again with these adult football gloves. Featuring AEROREADY technology on the back of the hand and fourchette material, our exclusive gloves provide amazing moisture wicking to keep your hands dry and cool. DESIGNED FOR COMFORT: Engineered with 11.0 PrimeKnit mesh, these superior football gloves deliver optimal structure, support, and performance. They have an ergonomically designed pattern to fully mimic natural hand movements and motion. THE PERFECT FOOTBALL GLOVE: Custom fit features for high-level performance such as a compression fit, venting without binding, breathability, dexterity, flexibility, superior fingertip construction, increased range of motion and a no-snag hook and loop closure for a perfect fit. Brand - adidas ** Material - Polyester, Nylon ** Size - Medium ** Sport - Football ** Age Range (Description) - Adult ** Color - Black/White ** Special Feature - Ther, Moisture Wicking, Breathable ** Hand Orientation - Ambidextrous ** Item Package Quantity - 1 ** Product Care Instructions - Hand Wash Only **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern, sporty aesthetic ideal for a performance-driven product. The top section features a bold, eye-catching headline ("heading") in large uppercase letters, followed by a prominent subheadline ("subheading") supporting the theme. Centered on the design, a high-resolution glove image ("product_image") is enclosed within dual concentric circular elements, emphasizing focus and precision. A circular price badge ("price") in the upper right region introduces vibrant contrast and urgency. Feature highlights are communicated in a horizontal row of bullet points ("description") near the bottom. A high-visibility call-to-action ("cta_button" and "cta") positioned at the bottom invites immediate interaction. Light radial and wave gradient layers in the background, along with decorative circles and dashed lines, add depth without overwhelming the composition.

**Color Palette**:  
- Crimson Red: `#D50032`  
- Deep Charcoal: `#333333`  
- White: `#FFFFFF`  
- Light Gray: `#F5F5F5`, `#EBEBEB`, `#E0E0E0`  
- Gradient Red: `#D50032` → `#B8002B`
product_color: This Adidas glove features a sleek and dynamic color palette primarily composed of crisp white (#FFFFFF) and deep red (#B21E28), balanced with subtle accents of muted gray (#D9D9D9). The base white provides a clean backdrop, enhancing visibility and contrast for the rich red logo and perforation details. The red elements are strategically placed to highlight the brand identity and create a sense of energy. Interior accents in a brighter red (#E0242D) add depth and focus toward the grip area. The harmonious blending of white and red, underpinned by minimal gray, creates a modern, sporty feel ideal for bold advertisement banners.
